brief_title: Mechanism of Action of TRAVATAN 0.004% in Subjects With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to describe the effect of TRAVATAN 0.004% Ophthalmic Solution on aqueous humor dynamics in subjects with a clinical diagnosis of open angle glaucoma (OAG) or ocular hypertension (OHT).
criteria: - Subjects 18 years of age or older - of either sex - of any race - diagnosed with ocular hypertension or open angle glaucoma
